metadata.name: Potentially Suspicious Regsvr32 HTTP IP Pattern
metadata.comment: Detects regsvr32 execution to download and install DLLs located remotely where the address is an IP address.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\regsvr32.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('regsvr32.exe') AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /i:http://1')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /i:http://2')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /i:http://3')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /i:http://4')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /i:http://5')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /i:http://6')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /i:http://7')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /i:http://8')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /i:http://9')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /i:https://1')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /i:https://2')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /i:https://3')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /i:https://4')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /i:https://5')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /i:https://6')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /i:https://7')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /i:https://8')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /i:https://9')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -i:http://1')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -i:http://2')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -i:http://3')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -i:http://4')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -i:http://5')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -i:http://6')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -i:http://7')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -i:http://8')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -i:http://9')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -i:https://1')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -i:https://2')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -i:https://3')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -i:https://4')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -i:https://5')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -i:https://6')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -i:https://7')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -i:https://8')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -i:https://9'))))

output.summary: Detects regsvr32 execution to download and install DLLs located remotely where the address is an IP address.

metadata.objective: False positive: FQDNs that start with a number such as "7-Zip" References: https://twitter.com/mrd0x/status/1461041276514623491, https://twitter.com/tccontre18/status/1480950986650832903, https://lolbas-project.github.io/lolbas/Binaries/Regsvr32/
